getDocument(InputStream) - Method in interface documentclassifier.Scrapers.Scraper
Method that takes in input an InputStream, reads a document from it, and returns an array of strings, with its title (position 0) and text (position 1).

Method that returns the current value of K for K-Fold cross validation.

Method that returns the maximum value of K for K-Fold cross validation, dependant on the dimension of the training set.

Method that returns the minimum value of K for K-Fold cross validation.

getMetric(boolean) - Method in class documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierApp
Method that returns the name of the metric currently used to calculate the distance between each document of the training set and the query document.

Method that returns the reference to the preferences node used by the application.
getScraper(boolean) - Method in class documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierApp
Method that returns the reference to the instance of the current scraper, used to extract the features (the terms) from documents.
getScrapersPackageName() - Method in class documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierApp
Method that returns the name of the package where all scrapers must be put, in order to be correctly registered and used by the program.

Method that returns the complete name of the class which implements the current stemmer.

Method that returns the path of the file containing the list of stopwords.
getTrainingSet() - Method in class documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierApp
This method returns a reference to the current training set.

Method that returns the path of the training set directory.
getTrainingSetSize() - Method in class documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierApp
This method returns the total dimension of the current training set, that is the number of different documents thereby present.
